raw_excerpt: <!DOCTYPE html><html lang="en" dir="ltr" data-theme="dark"><head><meta charset="utf-8"/><meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1"/><title>Tauri 2.0 | Tauri</title><link rel="canonical" href="https://v2.tauri.app/"/></head>
summary: Landing page for Tauri 2.0: small, secure, cross-platform app toolkit. Links to guides, references, blog, and releases. Emphasizes frontend-agnostic approach, minimal binary size, and multi-platform targets (desktop and mobile).
